#summary The navigator.appName property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.appName` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyMSIE Internet Explorer] returns `"Microsoft Internet Explorer"` for this property.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns `"Netscape"` for this property.
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns `"Netscape"` for this property.
  * [BrowserFamilyOpera Opera] returns `"Opera"` for this property.

This property is read-only.
